summary: Document conversion tool with multiple format support including Word to PDF conversion
architectural_notes: Word to PDF conversion supports both .doc and .docx formats
Conversion includes error handling with retry functionality
File download mechanism for converted PDFs

existing_features.title: Rebuild the Word to PDF conversion logic to properly convert .doc and .docx files to PDF format with maintained formatting
Ensure the converted PDF file downloads properly to the user's device after successful conversion
Add comprehensive error handling for conversion failures with user-friendly error messages
Add a retry button that allows users to attempt conversion again after an error without re-uploading the file

projectName: Fix Word to PDF conversion feature
